attributes.action: Change the Laws relating to Buying and Selling Property
attributes.additional_details: Disabled person left with no Lift and access to upstairs . Buyers requested removal of lift and adaptations before purchase. This all done in goodwill. Buyers pulled out on eve of signing knowing all this work had been done for them at great cost.
attributes.background:
Buyers pulled out eve of signing with reason of solicitors dragging feet.
Disabled person left with no lift to access toilet and bedroom.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. If there is a specific change that you would like Parliament to make to the law, you could start a new petition about that. 

Alternatively, you may wish to sign one or more of these petitions, which are similar to yours: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/164808
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/161644
